color.description:
main color of the button: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205

width.description:
width of the widget. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: 15

height.description:
height of the widget. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: "25%"

extra_trigger_size.description:
transparent extra trigger area, must > 0 or else the widget will not be triggered.
Default 5

eventMap.description:
array of tuples(int, string), int refers for the mouse button id.
 if you don't know what id your extra mouse key is, please run with `way-edges [group_name] --mouse-debug`: example [[1, "kitty #open up kitty console"],]

redraw_only_on_pa_change.description: redraw only on pulseaudio sink or source info change

device.description: Can empty(default sink or source), just don't include this key. Device description for sink or source. you can find it with `pactl list sinks | grep Name:`

preview_size.description:
how much area should the widget reveal when hidden
Default 3

progress_direction.description:
progress bar left/down -> right/up : Forward/Backward
Default Forward

on_change.description: command to execute, replace '{progress}' with the progress from 0-1

is_text_position_start.description:
which side percentage info at, start or end of the widget
Default true

obtuse_angle.description: The 2 obtuse angle in trapezoid, set it within 90-180

radius.description: Radius of the rounded corners for 2 obtuse angle in trapezoid, default 20

draggable.description:
Is progress changable by dragging and clicking
Default true

update_with_interval_ms.description:
update progress with command given milliseconds, Please be noted that the return value of the command must be between 0 and 1.
Example: [1000, "echo 0.2333"]

device_name.description:
remove this key to use default. monitor name, you can find it under `/sys/class/backlight.
Example: amdgpu-bl2

redraw_only_on_change.description: redraw only when monitor brightness change

BoxedWidgets.description: Widgets that should be wrapped within a Box

type.description: Type of the widget. supported types: `btn`, `slide`, `speaker`, `microphone`, `backlight`, `box`, `hyprland-workspace`

Box.description: Box widgets with grid layout, only support limited widgets

widgets.description: Widgets that should be wrapped within a Box

index.description: index of the widget's position in the grid

ring_width.description: ring width, should be less than radius

prefix.description: Text on the left side of the ring, default empty

font_family.description: Font family of all text within ring widget, use default by not include this key

preset.description: preset update function of the ring

update_with_interval_ms.description:
update progress with command given milliseconds
Progress must be between 0 and 1.
 You can disable template by not providing text after"\n"
Example: [1000, "printf "0.2333\n23.33%"]

font_family.description: Font family of all text within ring widget, use default by not include this key

format.description: time format, optional, please refer to [https://docs.rs/chrono/latest/chrono/naive/struct.NaiveDateTime.html#method.format]

time_zone.description:
time zone, optional, please refer to [https://docs.rs/chrono-tz/0.9.0/chrono_tz/enum.Tz.html]
default local

update_with_interval_ms.description: update text with command given milliseconds

thickness.description: Equivalent to the old width, thickness of the hyprland workspace bar.

length.description: Equivalent to the old height, length of the hyprland workspace bar.

active_increase.description:
How much length should one workspace increase when it's active.
[0-1]

workspace_transition_duration.description: Animation time of active_increase switching between workspaces.

widgets.description: All widgets in the config file

type.description: Type of the widget. supported types: `btn`, `slide`, `speaker`, `microphone`, `backlight`, `box`, `hyprland-workspace`
